topic: We should legalize cannabis

topic: Assisted suicide should be a criminal offence

topic: We should end mandatory retirement
argument: mandatory retirement ages are inconsistent with modern workplace practices and are contrary to the desire for age equality
key_point: A mandatory retirement age decreases institutional knowledge

topic: We should abolish the right to keep and bear arms
